Key Match Events: Grant McCray launched his second homer of the game, a two-run shot off Yuki Matsui to make it 6-3
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Mike Shildt said that Jackson Merrill could return to the starting lineup on Sunday
Xander Bogaerts said that the Padres can't worry too much about the other teams
Post-Match Reflections: Xander Bogaerts said that the Padres obviously didn't play their best game and left way too many guys on the bases
Bogaerts said that they can wash out what they did today and play better tomorrow
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luis Arraez had three hits on Saturday and has not struck out in a whopping 110 plate appearances
Manny Machado did not homer Saturday, but remains on a tear and is hitting.320 this month
Others: The Padres offense is loaded and might be the best in franchise history
Ha-Seong Kim injured his right shoulder diving back into first base last month in Colorado and is still not throwing across the diamond at 100%
